channel.title: NYSE listing on FinanClub

item.title: LU
item.description: score:-60 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd offers personal lending and wealth management solutions, catering to the growing demand for personal financial services in China. Risks: The recent downgrade by analysts may affect the market confidence in Lufax Holding Ltd. The company received a notice from the NYSE regarding its trading price, which could potentially impact its listing.
